name: Superhero Stories
description:
Welcome back to Superhero Simulator(it's called "Superhero Stories" now)!!

Prepare to live amazing experiences with the new quest feature! And wait, you can also grab stuff now! AMAZING!!!!

Superhero Stories (almost) reinvents the great game that SuperHero Simulator was, and now, the updates are REAL!!

Let's get serious now. Play in the snow and help Santa on the Christmas DLC and play around with the brand-new grabbing feature (it's actually fun) while controlling a less buggy hero than the one from a year ago.

Controls

Left mouse - Fly

Right mouse - Use power(Fly faster)

Space - Fly up

R - Attempt to get out of wall

esc - Pause
